title: Invite-Only VC & Investor Connect with Zoth | Consensus Hong Kong : Feb 10-12, 2026
description: Zoth is hosting an exclusive, invite-only investor connect during Consensus HK: Feb 10-12, 2026. This private table meeting is designed for VCs and investors to engage directly with the Zoth's leadership team. This is not a public meetup or builder session. It s a curated opportunity for one-on-one discussions with Zoth s leadership team to explore potential partnerships and gain insights ahead of Zoth s upcoming TGE launch.

title: Consensus 2026 Official Opening Night Party - Hong Kong
location: The Trilogy, 26/F, H Code, 45 Pottinger St, Central, Hong Kong
description: Join us for the Consensus 2026 Official Opening Night Party at The Trilogy, a multi-experience destination spanning three distinct spaces on the 26th floor, overlooking the Hong Kong skyline. Piranha and Platinum Badge Holders preregistrations are closed, for entry please bring your Piranha or Platinum Badge with you for entry. AGENDA 7:00 PM - 9:00 PM: Reception & Networking Kick off the week with complimentary cocktails and curated networking. Connect with founders, builders, investors, and leaders shaping the future of crypto, Web3, and digital finance. Please bring Consensus badge for priority access. 9:00 PM Late After Party The experience activates across all three venues throughout the night. WHAT S HAPPENING IN EACH SPACE Ella (Speakeasy Lounge) Live performances by Vossa 45-minute sets at 8:30 PM and 9:45 PM Note: Seating is limited inside Ella Rooftop WAV Anil Ahuja & DJ Mia: Immersive rooftop visuals featuring works from 30 renowned global artists Keyz Nightclub 10:00 PM 1:00 AM Special DJ set by Dayah Modo Produced by NOLCHA Special Note: Consensus Piranha or Platinum Badge Holders are granted express entry by showing their badge at entry.

description: Start the conference the Hong Kong way We re heading out for a relaxed group run to shake off travel, jet lag, and screens before a full day of panels. title: Crypto Outdoor Workout (COW) - Consensus Hong Kong 2026
location: Victoria Park, 1 Hing Fat St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
description: Suitable for ANY fitness level Take a break from the conference sessions with an outdoor workout at the beautiful Victoria park! Expect a bit of everything: warmup squats pushups wontons chin-ups dips abs stretches // Find one misfit Feel free to: exercise with our coaches work out on your own keep your own pace (join / leave at any time) ************** Drinking water and high-protein snacks provided! ************** Supported by: Wirex - global payments platform serving both consumers and businesses, offering card-based payment products alongside card issuance and banking infrastructure for partners. For end users, Wirex provides payment cards and banking features designed for everyday spending. For businesses, Wirex offers Banking-as-a-Service APIs, card issuance, and payment rails that enable digital platforms to launch compliant, globally accepted card programs. Trusted by over 7 million users since 2014, Wirex has processed 20 billion in transactions across 130 countries. As a principal Visa and Mastercard member, it makes crypto spendable anywhere instantly and effortlessly. CTRL - non-profit community of open-source contributors. ************** Some of previous COW (Crypto Outdoor Workout) events: Devconnect Buenos Aires 2025: https://luma.com/10mc25n4 Token2049 Singapore 2025: https://luma.com/5zszm1qt NapulETH Naples 2025: https://luma.com/csb8kp9q EthCC[8] Cannes 2025: https://lu.ma/0poy12p2 ETH Belgrade 2025: https://lu.ma/fo6k71cz ETH Prague: htt...

title: Meet the Sunrise: Qigong
description: February 11 Morning Qigong Energy refill before Consensus Start your day with mindful movement and Taoist practices designed to awaken your body and bring focus to the present moment. Our morning qigong includes Eastern attention practices and gentle breathwork that help you feel the shift in your state and cultivate an eco-friendly approach to self-regulation. In the fast-changing world of the Web3 industry, taking care of ourselves is essential we live and work at high speed, and mindful pauses help us restore balance. Join us in taking this step toward awareness and self-care. Gathering starts at 7:55 AM Qigong - Breathwork - Networking Powered by: * Web 3 Ethics Alliance https://web3ethics.org/

title: Amigoo Ventures - OTC Dealmakers: Coffee & Capital
description: Hope you all had a great start to 2026! Amigoo Ventures is thrilled to brew our morning OTC Coffee Meet up for the second time in HK. Our small pax private event is exclusively for those active in the Secondary/ OTC/ Liquid markets. Usually our event attracts leadership teams from the projects, foundations, hedge funds, VCs, liquid funds, family offices, and deal flow partners. So, come have a coffee with us and let s do some networking and deals. Who is this event for: Token Listed Projects, Secondary Token Investors, OTC Brokers. title: 香港數字財富機構論壇  | Hong Kong Digital Wealth Institutional Forum
Beyond Scaling: The Age of Autonomous DeFi
description: Hosted by ScalingX during Consensus HK 2026, this exclusive side event explores the powerful convergence of Artificial Intelligence and Decentralized Finance. The industry conversation has long centered on scalability. This event moves the spotlight forward into the era of autonomy. We will examine how AI is actively transforming on-chain activity through AI-driven trading, autonomous liquidity management, prediction markets, and next-generation payment systems. These are not future concepts, but emerging realities reshaping how financial systems operate without human intervention. Join founders, builders, and infrastructure leaders as we define the next chapter of intelligent finance. title: CRYPTO QUANT 2026 -- The Quest for Certainty: Quant Trading in Uncertain Times
location: Hong Kong, 天后電氣道58號Cai Building 蔡氏大廈
description: Event Overview During Consensus 2026, we will convene to confront one of the market s core questions head-on: how to build sustainable quantitative edge amid uncertainty. With the central theme Searching for Certainty: Quantitative Trading in an Age of Uncertainty, CRYPTO QUANT 2026 brings together leading quantitative fund managers, algorithmic traders, data scientists, and crypto asset researchers from around the world. This event is not only a high-level dialogue, but also a critical prelude to the Crypto Championship Quant 2026, the global quantitative trading competition. It is designed as a premier platform for elite participants to engage in strategy exchange, capital connection, and ecosystem co-building all in service of mastering market volatility. Host Crypto Quant 2026 Barron s China Crypto Quant 2026 Crypto Quant 2026 is an annual flagship series under DeAI Expo, dedicated to digital asset management and AI-driven quantitative investment. It comprises two core pillars: Digital Asset Management Forum Crypto Quantitative Trading Competition The competition will become the world s first long-cycle, live-trading quantitative contest in digital assets. Built on the principles of real capital, real data, and real competition, the event runs from January to April 2026 over three months. Participants will trade via real accounts on leading international crypto exchanges, competing across strategy performance, risk management, and innovation capability. Barron ...

title: MiCA Regulation #ConsensusHK | Private Executive Briefing
description: Due to venue capacity, only 110 seats are available. If you missed a spot, book a private meeting with Sergiu Vasilescu, Managing Partner of VD Law Group: https://calendly.com/sergiuvasilescu/30minutes Following the success of our European editions, VD Law Group brings its flagship MiCA Regulatory Masterclass to Consensus Hong Kong. This exclusive side event is designed for founders, executives, investors, and compliance leaders operating at the intersection of Web3 and global regulation. Gain strategic legal insight into the EU s MiCA framework and its impact on licensing, market access, structuring, and cross-border operations. Categories of Crypto Asset Service Providers regulated under MiCA Custody and administration of crypto-assets on behalf of clients Operation of a crypto-asset trading platform Exchange services Execution of orders for crypto-assets on behalf of clients Placing of crypto-assets Reception and transmission of orders for crypto-asset Advisory services on crypto-assets Portfolio management on crypto-assets Categories of Tokens regulated under MiCA Asset-Referenced Tokens (ARTs) Electronic Money Tokens (EMTs) Other Crypto-Assets (including utility tokens) Limited seats available! Participation is subject to approval!

To keep it fair and ensure committed guests: 10 reservation fee CHF 10 back in Frankencoin ( ZCHF) if you actually show up Yes you eat well and leave with more Swiss Francs than you came with.
